solution_line_template: {total_pieces}/{fraction_denominator} = <<{total_pieces}/{fraction_denominator}={slices_eaten}>>{slices_eaten} slices of cake were eaten by Lovely's visitors.
So, {total_pieces} - {slices_eaten} = <<{total_pieces}-{slices_eaten}={slices_kept}>>{slices_kept} slices of cake were kept.
